doc.title: 'Columbia' and 'Shamrock II' Finishing Second Race
doc.plot: In this race the yachts cross the finishing line, as every one knows, under a nineteen-knot breeze. Our cameras are started while they are at a distance of about one-half mile and keep running until they cross the line. Both boats cross within twenty-feet of our camera and the effect is most stirring and interesting.
